name: DNA Hunt
description:
"We have lived on this planet for centuries. Dinosaurs on the surface and humans below it. But now it is dying. It's becoming uninhabitable both above the surface and below. All we can do to preserve life is to collect as much DNA as possible and settle somewhere else."

Local co-op game where one player shoots darts to collect DNA from dinosaurs while another player drives a car dodging the panicked dinosaurs and making sure to bring them both to safety.

  • Collect as many samples of DNA as possible
  • Avoid smashing into forthcoming objects
  • Recommended that Player 2 uses a controller

By working together, you and your associate can save the dinosaurs!

This project  was made in a week as part of Epic Mega Jam 2022

(Missed the deadline by seconds)

Credits:

Taina Lehtiaho - Programming, Art, Animation, Sound Design, Level Design

Elin Masar - Art, Animation

Satu Anttila - Art, Animation
